column4: AISUCMA 2024: Artificial intelligence in supply chain management
column5: The workshop aims to provide participants with a comprehensive understanding of how AI technologies are revolutionizing the field of supply chain management through a combination of theoretical insights and practical applications (https://ull-smart-computing.github.io/aisucma2024).

column4: Case study in supplier relationship management: Assisting buyers with sustainability insights using generative AI technology
Reinforcement Learning for Efficient Returns Management
Predicting demand and seasonal patterns of waste production to improve waste collection planning
A Versatile Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning Benchmark for Inventory Management
